message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $150 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer. While I'm motivated to sell, I can't quite go down to $120 just yet. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $135?
Hello Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose an offer of $130 if possible.
